bibl.title: Losing a Curious Christian Scroll but Gaining a Curious Christian Codex. An Oxyrhynchus Papyrus of Exodus and Revelation.
bibl.note: Argues that P. Lond. Inv. 2053 (recto: P. Oxy. VIII, 1075 [= van Haelst 44; LDAB 3477]; verso: P. Oxy. VIII, 1079 [= van Haelst 559; LDAB 2786]) was not part of a reused roll, but might rather be a leaf from a codex with an eclectic mix of contents copied by different scribes. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Brent Nongbri, Losing a Curious Christian Scroll but Gaining a Curious Christian Codex. An Oxyrhynchus Papyrus of Exodus and Revelation.

Argues that P. Lond. Inv. 2053 (recto: P. Oxy. VIII, 1075 [= van Haelst 44; LDAB 3477]; verso: P. Oxy. VIII, 1079 [= van Haelst 559; LDAB 2786]) was not part of a reused roll, but might rather be a leaf from a codex with an eclectic mix of contents copied by different scribes. - Avec résumé en anglais.
